title: Liberty Meadows Big Book of Love
description: Liberty Meadows has been nominated for the Harvey Award and the National Cartoonist Society's Ruben Award for "Best Comic Strip, " and now, Frank Cho's work is presented in this deluxe hardcover format. More than a collection of Liberty Meadow strips dating back to 1997, this book also boasts completely retouched art and colored Sunday strips, as well as illustrations not available anywhere else.
author: Frank Cho
